frontmatter.description:
Allows access to BOM table information and values.
IMPORTANT:
You can no longer insert IBomTable objects; you can now only insert
IBomTableAnnotation
objects. IBomTable objects are not and cannot be converted to IBomTableAnnotation objects. Use the IBomTable APIs for legacy BOM tables only.

title: IBomTable
description:
Allows access to BOM table information and values.
IMPORTANT:
You can no longer insert IBomTable objects; you can now only insert
